thread.title: Manchester City’s stars arrive at their luxurious 5-star Emirates Palace Abu Dhabi hotel just hours after defeating Monaco 5-3 in the Champions League – where the cheapest room is £500 A NIGHT
thread.title_full: Manchester City’s stars arrive at their luxurious 5-star Emirates Palace Abu Dhabi hotel just hours after defeating Monaco 5-3 in the Champions League – where the cheapest room is £500 A NIGHT

author: jhutchinson
title: Manchester City’s stars arrive at their luxurious 5-star Emirates Palace Abu Dhabi hotel just hours after defeating Monaco 5-3 in the Champions League – where the cheapest room is £500 A NIGHT
text:
EFL ABU HAVING FUN? Manchester City’s stars arrive at their luxurious 5-star Emirates Palace Abu Dhabi hotel just hours after defeating Monaco 5-3 in the Champions League – where the cheapest room is £500 A NIGHT 
But the City footballers aren't there for a holiday - there are football pitches and high-tech gyms that will be utilised Pictured
